// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper2[16] = {
	53, 0,
	2, 22,
	0, 27,
	3, 33,
	8, 33,
	61, 17,
	64, 9,
	54, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper2[16] = {
	0.828125f, 0.000000f,
	0.031250f, 0.647059f,
	0.000000f, 0.794118f,
	0.046875f, 0.970588f,
	0.125000f, 0.970588f,
	0.953125f, 0.500000f,
	1.000000f, 0.264706f,
	0.843750f, 0.000000f
};
